name: LegacyTextItems
shortdesc: A collection of legacy text items.

property.name: typename
property.shortdesc: The class name of the object.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: Number of elements in the collection.

method.name: getByName
method.shortdesc: Get the first element in the collection with the provided name.

method.name: convertToNative
method.shortdesc: Create text frames from all legacy text items. The original legacy text items will be deleted.
